name: Space Ball
description: Space Ball is a casual adventure game, In this game, you need to control the ball, through the spikes, jump over the magma, collect gold coins along the way, and finally reach the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU built-in graphics card with at least 256MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
